title: "Acer launches three new graphics cards including its first Radeon GPU"
excerpt: "Acer is beefing up their Predator BiFrost series of graphics cards with 3 new releases. Previously the Intel Arc 770 (16GB) was the only card in the Predator BiFrost line. The new Predator BiFrost Radeon RX 7600 (8GB) is the first Radeon model GPU to come from Acer."
